alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 06 at 2:09PM PST until November 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times over Westgard Pass on SR 168.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
